name: Pantry Antics
overview: You control a pink mouse whose aim is to knock crockery off the pantry shelves. You have to dodge the flapping birds, bouncing frogs, leaping cats and swooping bats. The pantry comprises five shelves with gaps through which your rodent may jump up or fall through. However, there are various animals patrolling the pantry of this house and contact with any of them means certain death.
